text: Francis Dufour (March 28, 1929 - May 25, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was the member for Jonquière in the National Assembly of Quebec from 1985 to 1996. He was a member of the Parti Québécois from 1985 until 1996. Dufour was born in Jonquière, Quebec. Dufour died on May 25, 2020 in Jonquière at the age of 91.L’ancien maire et député de Jonquière Francis Dufour décède à 91 ans ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Quebec
title: Francis Dufour
